Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Hoyne
ShortDescription: 126 buses temp. rerouted EB: Jackson, Leavitt, Congress, Damen, and Jackson; WB: Jackson, Van Buren, Leavitt, and Jackson near Jackson/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Hoyne, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson, Leavitt, Congress, Damen, and Jackson.

Westbound buses will operate via Jackson, Van Buren, Leavitt, and Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays at O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays at O'Hare.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
